title.rendered: Roomi vs Iroommates: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder

content.rendered:
You’ve put down the deposit for a beautiful new home, filled in the paperwork, and packed up your favorite candles and posters. Now, if you’re looking for a roommate you can split the bills and utilities with to save a bit of money, you’ve come to the right place! In this guide, we’ll walk you through the all-in-one roommate finder platform, Roomi, and how it compares to Iroommates.

Pricing: Are these Roommate Finder Apps Free or Paid?

Generally speaking, roommate finder apps are free to download, and you can access the most basic features (e.g., personal profiles of potential roommates) on that plan, but you may have to pay to use some of the more advanced tools on offer.

Iroommates offers two types of membership:

With the Iroommates Free Access Membership, you can search for roommates on the website, but with this package, you will only be able to contact the landlords who have listed their contact information as “free.”

The Iroommates Full Access Membership prices vary according to the state and where you’re looking to move to. They provide a form on their website to help you get an accurate quote for your location. Iroommates members with Full Access can directly contact potential roommates via email and phone. Members may also visit the profile page of each landlord in order to learn more about them and their properties. However, this membership expires automatically after 90 days.

Related: Coping With Financial Stress During COVID-19

Now, let’s look at the pricing for Roomi. First off, the roommate finder app is free to download and easy to use, allowing you to carry out your roommate search hassle-free! As a free member of Roomi, you can swipe up to five times per day and post or activate two listings.

What is included in Roomi’s Gold subscription plan?

  • Unlimited messages (plus, on mobile, you also get unlimited swipes!)
  • A Fully Verified status upgrade which gets you 5x more messages!
  • A ranking boost for 7x more views on your profile and listings.
  • 5 active listings to post all the empty rooms in your apartment.
  • Free bookings to save over $100 on safe money transfer between you and your new Roomi!

The Gold subscription can be paid monthly or weekly. Monthly payments start at $29.99, which works out at $0.97 per day – cheaper than your cup of coffee!

For more information on pricing plans tailored to your needs, head on over to Roomi’s support page.

Security: Can These Apps Help Me Find Roommates I Can Trust?

Are you new to the city? Are you an international student living off-campus with no family or friends nearby? Whatever your situation, searching for a roommate invariably raises concerns about safety. So, can a roommate finder app like Roomi or Iroommate help you find safe roomies?

Let’s take a thorough look at the checklist below and review the services that Roomi can offer you as an Iroommates alternative to ensure you find a safe roomie:

Verifies Roommate Contact Info

To sign up for the roommate finder services offered by Iroommates, you can authorize your Facebook or Google accounts or simply use your email address. However, not all profiles have a ‘verified’ badge on them. The Iroommates alternative Roomi uses GlobalID. This is a digital identity platform that verifies users and their contact information while keeping their data safe and secure.

Related: What Can I Do If My Roommate Has Bad Credit?

ID Verification

Do you use your driver’s license or passport to verify your identity at convenience stores and airports? Similarly, Roomi has laid out specific profile photo requirements that are uniform across all profiles to ensure everyone follows the same safety protocols, This way, you can be sure that the user profiles you are looking at are verified and avoid scams!

Iroommates offers its users tenant screening reports, which include the following: credit and criminal reports, eviction reports, and employment and rental history verification reports.

However, Roomi is a powerful Iroommates alternative, because with Roomi Gold, you can get your own Fully Verified status and can view other profiles that have the same blue tick! Don’t worry if you’re on the free plan, though. Even without a subscription, Roomi has various levels of verification available for everyone.

Privacy & Security of Profiles

With Roomi, you don’t have to worry. Roomi offers secure in-app messaging features and keeps your contact information safe. Additionally, under GDPR, you can request to have your data deleted after filling out a form! Just write a quick email to Roomi’s support team, and we’ll delete your information from our database.

Meanwhile, Iroommates keeps their users’ data safe using their own security metrics and in compliance with the Payment Card Industry (PCI) Data Security requirements of Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

Related: How do I browse people (roommates) on Roomi?

24/7 Support & Content Moderation

The Roomi platform has its own content moderation team to filter out bad listings and make sure that the content is real. However, the thorough verification process of Roomi makes searching for roommates reliable and safe. On the other hand, Iroommates uses its own proprietary Mail Server technology to ensure that only genuine and qualified leads are delivered to you.

Criminal Background Check

If you need a background check, this powerful Iroommates alternative will do it against several international and local criminal databases. Also, the Roomi Gold plan offers a background check for all sign-ups helping you get a verified badge that guarantees at least five times more visibility, increasing your chances of finding the perfect roommate, sans the worry!

User Profiles: Which App Makes It Easier to Find Your Perfect Roommate?

While both roommate finder platforms are easy and fun to use, the Iroommates alternative, Roomi, goes the extra mile. Roomi features more specific options, allowing you to filter by neighborhood, preferences, and recent activity, which makes your roommate search that bit easier!

Is it LGBTQIA+ Friendly?

Absolutely! Roomi gives you total control over your search, which makes the platform one of the top roommate finders there is! With Roomi, you can filter and sieve until you find your perfect roommate! This great Iroommates alternative is focused on helping you find someone you’re comfortable living with, no questions asked.

Find Roommates

So, Which is the Best Roommate Finder for You?

We at Roomi know that roommates can make or break your experience of living in a new city. For this reason, our roommate finder platform provides easy access to roommate information and simple steps for profile verification, while keeping the membership plans affordable! This app is a great Iroommates alternative and your one-stop-navigator to find roommates free of charge, with special attention paid to keeping private information secure. Look no further – the roommate finder of your dreams is here!

Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
